name: HOLIDAY SAMPLE PACK
description:
WE ARE EXCITED ABOUT THIS WEEKS FEATURE "SPA PACK"
You will be swept away to Botanical Bliss with sweet scents that will make your personal spa experience purely Amazing!! 

AMAZING BATH TEA BAG (up to three uses)
SIMPLY DIVINE NATURALS 2oz SUGAR CLEANSING SCRUB
SDOT BEAUTY BODY VELVET 2oz
AVOCADO OIL 2oz
ALOE MINT SPRITZ 2oz

BONUS: NEW GREEN POMADE TIN

YOU ARE FOUR STEPS AWAY FROM YOUR PERSONAL SPA TREATMENT!

1) PLACE YOUR TEA BAG IN YOUR BATH AND STEP FOR 5-7 MINUTES.  STEP INTO YOUR BOTANICAL BATH AND SOAK THE DAY AWAY.

2) USE SIMPLY DIVINE NATURAL'S SUGAR SCRUBS TO EXFOLIATE AND CLEANSE YOUR SKIN.  YOUR SKIN WILL THANK YOU FOR THIS MOISTURIZING "SUGAR KISS"

3) AFTER YOUR BATH, WRAP YOURSELF IN SDOT'S BEAUTY'S BODY VELVET.  FEEL THE BUTTERS PROTECT YOUR SKIN FROM THE HARSH WINTER DAY'S.

4) SEAL THE DEAL WITH OUR AVOCADO OIL!  THIS LIGHT FRUIT OIL WILL SEAL IN THE MOISTURE AND PREVENT DRY SKIN.


BONUS: ALOE MINT TO REFRESH YOUR STYLES AND GREEN POMADE TO SEAL IN MOISTURE AND ADD SHINE :-)



**THIS PACK WILL CHANGE THROUGHOUT THE SEASON :-)

name: THE CURL PACK
description:
OUR BEST SELLING ITEM!! TRY OUR SYSTEM IT'S VERSATILE & READY FOR YOUR STYLE NEEDS!

Try a few of our hair products in our CURL PACK! This pack is the best for you and the kids hair!  Detangles, Style and Seal! Bring JOY to Mommy and Me hair time!!
Maintain your beautiful mane with products that add moisture, shine and BUST FRIZZ down!  

MOISTURE

DEEP CONDITION/LEAVE IN STYLER
HONEY CONDISH - 8 oz

LEAVE IN OR DEEP CONDITION HONEY YES!!  Our Honey Condish is a CREAMY formula filled with Amazing Butters.  It's NOT a slippery conditioner  but, expect tangle free hair and kiss the knots goodbye!  Your hair will be soft and silky. 
Our versatile conditioner is made with Wildflower Honey infused with Marshmallow Root, Chamomile, Plantain and Irish Moss. Honey is known to aid in moisture by restoring dry brittle hair, we have added Japanese Camellia Seed and Grapeseed rich in Vitamins A, B, C, and E . Your hair will be SOFT and manageable!  
How can I Use the Conditioner?  IT'S THE PERFECT LEAVE IN CREAM FOR THE LOC METHOD (liquid, oil, cream) to lock in the moisture.
What's Inside:  
Distilled Water, Aloe Vera, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetearyl Alcohol(moisturizing),Marshmallow Root, Honey, Avocado Butter,Cupuacu Butter, Shea Butter, JBCO(black castor), Camellia Seed oil, Plantago Extract, Avena Oat Extract,Irish Moss, Potassium Sorbate (food grade preservative), Optiphen ND (paraben free preservative) & Vanilla 

DETANGLE

ALOE MINT SPRITZ 4oz
 
This LEAVE IN Conditioning spray helps to detangle and moisturize while keeping your hair frizz free.  Use daily to enhance and shine your curls!  GREAT FOR DETANGLING YOU OR YOUR KIDDIES HAIR!
*Multi Use- Blend 2 oz of Aloe Mint Spritz with 2oz of spring water and 2oz hibiscus gel to create a setting lotion.  
Inside the bottle: Distilled water and Aloe Juice infused with Marshmallow root, Burdock, Nettle, Horsetail, Plantain Extract, Irish Moss and Peppermint, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Jojoba oil, JBCO, Shea butter, Wildflower Honey, Panthenol, Neem Oil, and Rosemary 


READY,SET,HOLD

HIBISCUS GEL 4oz

SIMPLE TWISTS, TWIST OUTS, ROLLER SETS, WASH AND GO'S!
Tired of the gels with ingredients you can’t pronounce?  Embrace the soft hold flake free movement! Use this gel for soft hold for your curls and waves, giving a full bounce throughout the day.  All Natural with a balance of oils and natural conditioners so, your hair doesn’t miss a thing!
Inside the Jar:
Distilled Water, Flaxseed, Hibiscus tea infusion,Chamomile, Aloe Gel, Optiphen,Rosemary, Lavender, Sunflower, Glycerin, Xantham Gum

SEAL AND SHINE
PUMPKIN POMADE 2oz

Made with rich Babassu Oil and Pumpkin Butter, this light pomade will dress your hair in vitamin A, C, E, and Omega fatty acids.  Roll out the "The Royal Treatment" your crown deserves!  Our pomade locks in moisture without leaving a greasy feel.  Can also be used as a body butter.  Did you know Pumpkin Seed Oil is said to reduce wrinkles and free radicals?  Yummy Goodnes!
Use to palm roll, roller set, braid, twist outs and great sealant for styling natural hair.  
Inside the Tin: Babassu oil, Pumpkin Seed Butter, Uccuba Butter, JBCO, Candelilla Wax, Saw Palmetto, Bergamont, Rosemary, and botanical blend
2oz tin
Great for Children's Hair!



"Thanks for making a package with step by step use!  My daughters hair is sooooo Amazing (pun intended).  She is always looking forward to getting her hair done now!  The Aloe Mint and Honey Condish made that happen! Thanks Amazing Botanicals :-) Kia and Amber Chicago"

"I have been getting the Curl Pack since you introduced it last year.  I never tried the Condish, I was loyal to another.  My last order I noticed the condish was added to the pack and all I'm going to say is "BRAVO" you should bhave done this last year and I would have drop the other conditioner!  The Conditioner is Amazing and yes I style, leave in and deep condition with it!  No more spending all the extra $$, I Love YOU Amazing Botanicals! Kara-Albany,NY" 

"After seeing a picture of the Curl Pack results, I had to try it out.  I used the Condish, Gel and Pomade combination and my hair was so shiny soft and bouncy!  My twist out lasted for a week!  Thank You for a Great product.  Sheri-Brooklyn, NY"

name: BLACK SOAP SHAMPOO
description:
New FRESH SCENT!!
BLACK SOAP POO 4oz or 8oz  
SULFATE FREE, MOISTURIZING AND SUDSY!
Our Black Soap Shampoo is infused with Red Palm, Grapeseed, Marshmallow root, Burdock, Plantain,  Nettle, Rosemary, and Panthenol.  This super sudsy formula cleanses without drying and is enriched with Vitamins A,C,E and Beta Carotene.  Shampoo regularly and follow with our Honey Condish for an Amazing luster and shine!

You only need two teaspoons or less to wash!

"I was shocked at the amount of suds this shampoo produced!  I bought my first 8oz and it lasted for three months.  My husband and daughter love it..I can detangle her hair witht he shampoo!!! Thanks Ladies - Sheri Brooklyn,NY"

"I could never find a shampoo that would clean my locs properly!  I always had lint and buildup that would NOT budge.  My stylist used the Black Soap Shampoo and I haven't seen my hair this clean in years.  I had to buy some for those time when I don't see her but, not she carries the line!  Thanks so much AB, A shampoo that cleans locs and you don't have to use the BOTTLE!!! Mariland- Tampa, Fl"

"My hair is softer and the color seems brighter!  Is there a detangler in the shampoo, I almost didn't condition. lol K'Tina-Richmond, Ca"

name: BAOBAB OIL
description:
WE LOVE THIS OIL AND KNOW YOU WILL TO! Enjoy part of the "Tree of Life" A must have for ALL skin and hair types

This pure oil is extracted from Baobab fruit seeds absorbes easily and quickly into the skin leaving no oiliness or greasiness.  Highly moisturizing, emollient and soothing, containing vitamins A, D, E and F. 

This versatile all purpose oil, known for it's healing properties Baobab can be used to help heal cuts, burns, eczema, psoriasis,and other skin ailments. Give your hair an intensive repair treatment, add a few drops to your favorite conditioner to help with Winter dryness.  

Oil is pure but can be used neat or blended with other oils such as sunflower, jojoba, or avocado.

Directions: Apply small amounts to skin or hair for added moisture and shine. 



2oz squeeze bottle

Price check, shop around... we will beat Any price on the same size of oil!  Yup!

Check out these fun Baobab facts:
http://b4tea.com/information/baobab-tree-facts-interesting-information-about-its-healing-powers/ 


I'm so happy I found you at the street fair!  I have been purchasing Baobab online for a few years it' great for burns, scars, and my eczema!  When I saw you were local and offered it in a roll on, I was sold!  A little goes a long way, great application! Thanks Rhonda-Brooklyn

name: NEW GREEN POMADE
description:
We LOVE our Customers!  They give the best HONEST feedback and WE LISTEN!! THE LATEST REQUEST FROM "THE LAB" IS Our Solid Green Pomade!  This light slightly creamy pomade melts in your hair sealing in the moisture and perfect for your Natural Styles!  Sweet smelling like fresh baked tart!  TRY IT OUT!! THIS IS SURE TO BE YOUR FAVORITE NEW PRODUCT!

Directions for use: After you have washed and conditioned, section clean damp hair and apply from ends to root, make sure you use more product on the ends to protect them.  Use for sealing moisture and adding shine.  This pomade helps reduce frizz and extend styles such as twist outs, braid outs.

What's Inside?
Babassu Oil, Horsetail Butter, Avocado Oil, Vegetable Wax, Essential Oils of lavender, cedarwood, and lemon

2oz tin

name: ALL IN  ONE PACK
description:
Back By POPULAR DEMAND for Holiday 2013!!  The ENTIRE LINE IN ONE SWEET BOX!!

*ALOE MINT SPRITZ 8oz
*BLACK CASTOR ELIXIR 4oz

name: HIBISCUS GEL
description:
As featured on Essence.com http://ow.ly/nxsrX WANT SOFT HOLD AND CURLS? LOOK NO FURTHER!! 
TWO STRAND TWIST, TWIST OUT, ROLLER SET, WASH AND GO'S! 
Use this gel for soft hold for your  curls and waves, giving a full bounce throughout the day.

Now in a easy to use pump bottle 

For Best results use on wet hair. Section the hair and smoothly apply from root to end. Spray water on dry sections. For tight curls and control use more product for loose curls use less. Finger comb, separate twist, knots or curls after your hair has dried.

Inside:
Distilled Water, Flaxseed, Hibiscus tea infusion
n, Aloe Gel, Optiphen,Rosemary, Lavender, Sunflower, Glycerin, Xantham Gum

Choose your Scent:  Original(floral), Ocean(fresh), Unscented

**Supply Alert!  WE ARE RUNNING OUT OF GEL FASTER THAN WE CAN MAKE IT....WE ARE SELLING ALL GEL IN 4oz YOU ARE FREE TO PURCHASE UPTO 16oz HOWEVER, THEY WILL ALL COME IN 4oz BOTTLES.

name: BLACK CASTOR ELIXIR
description:
**Jamaican Black Castor Oil is known for its hair growth and thickening properties.  We have blended it with essential oils of sweet orange, rosemary, neem, and ylang ylang for a deep hot oil or daily treatment.
Inside:Jamaican Black Castor Oil, Camellia Seed Oil, Vitamin E, Sweet Orange, Rosemary, Neem, and Ylang Ylang Essential Oils.




**AMAZING BOTANICALS does not purchase JBCO via a third party.  We fly to Jamaica and oversee the roasting and pressing process of our FRESH BLACK CASTOR oil. The oil is thick,dark and amber in color**

description:
HONEY CONDISH 
GET BOMB TWIST OUTS AND STYLES
LEAVE IN OR DEEP CONDITION HONEY YES!!  Our Honey Condish is a CREAMY formula filled with Amazing Butters.  It's NOT a slippery conditioner  but, expect tangle free hair and kiss the knots goodbye!  Your hair will be soft and silky. 
Our versatile conditioner is made with Wildflower Honey infused with Marshmallow Root, Chamomile, Plantain and Irish Moss. Honey is known to aid in moisture by restoring dry brittle hair, we have added Japanese Camellia Seed and Grapeseed rich in Vitamins A, B, C, and E . Your hair will be SOFT and manageable!  
How can I Use the Conditioner?
DEEP CONDITION/LEAVE IN/STYLING CREAM

Distilled Water, Aloe Vera, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetearyl Alcohol(moisturizing),Marshmallow Root, Honey, Avocado Butter,Cupuacu Butter, Shea Butter, JBCO(black castor), Camellia Seed oil, Plantago Extract, Avena Oat Extract,Irish Moss, Potassium Sorbate (food grade preservative), Optiphen ND (paraben free preservative) & Vanilla 

"You all should add STYLING CREAM to this, my twists outs have never looked so good!  A week of moisture and I refresh with the Aloe Mint Spritz.  I have never had curls like these.  My Mother says I have, I don't remember!  I have told everyone about Amazing Botanicals, Thank You Lisa-Orange,NJ"

Your conditioner is my leave in and styling cream, I have also used it for deep conditioning adding a few oils and extras.  I am very happy with the money I have saved and the quality of your products!  Please don't change a thing. Shanika-Augusta, Ga"

name: ALOEMINT SPRITZ
description:
The AloeMint Spritz is a leave in condtioning moisturizing detangler.  Use the spritz to soften hair and wake up those curls!  Great for Combing out the little ones hair, stops the kiddies from
 screaming:-)
Works on Super Curly, Wavy, and Kinky Textures

What's in it?
Distilled water and Aloe Juice infused with Marshmallow root, Burdock, Nettle, Horsetail, Plantain, Irish Moss and Peppermint,Shea Oil, Black Castor oil,Panthenol,and Rosemary

Try our Sample size or full 8oz bottle


I LOVE this Spritz!  It smells so refreshing and my curls really pop when I use it!  One night a went to sleep with no scarf and I awoke to "scary hair" I prayed the spritz would work, I sprayed it all over and gently fluffed my hair and OH BOY! My hair came back and it lasted a few more days.  I tied it after that but, I want to Thank You Amazing Botanicals for a GREAT product! Charlotte -Atlanta,Ga 

"I receive the Aloe Mint Spritz in my Curl Kit and I'm hooked!  where have you been?!  I used it to refresh my hair after my twist out failed, my hair had new life it was soft and lasted all day!  Do you have a purse size?" Mel-Nashville

name: PUMPKIN POMADE
description:
WE LOVE THE POMADE!  OUR MOST POPULAR PRODUCT GOOD FROM HEAD TO TOE AND FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY!

Made with rich Babassu and Pumpkin Seed butter.  Rich in vitamin A, C, E, and Omega fatty acids, this is "The Royal Treatment" your crown deserves!  Our pomade locks in moisture without leaving a greasy feel.
Use to palm roll, roller set, braid, twist outs, blow outs and styling hair.  

Ingredients: Babassu oil, Pumpkin Seed Butter, Uccuba Butter, JBCO, Candelilla Wax, Saw Palmetto, Bergamont, Rosemary, and botanical blend

Great for Children's Hair and All over body care!
2oz SQUEEZE BOTTLE AVAILABLE JUNE 1!!

**WE HAVE HEARD YOU SOLID POMADE FAN CRIES :-)  WE WILL OFFER THE SOLID POMADE THIS SUMMER. 
 
DISCLAMER: IN THE WARMER MONTHS THE POMADE CAN SOFTEN OR MELT IF YOU ORDER PLEASE PLACE IN A COOL DARK PLACE OR REFRIGERATE.

name: HOLIDAY SAMPLE OIL PACK
description:
ENJOY A SELECTION OF OUR OILS!  

AVOCADO OIL  
100% Pure Avocado Oil 
This rich penetrating fruit oil (yes, avocado is a fruit)  is beneficial to the hair and body.   High in monounsaturated fatty acid~which aides in hair moisture and strength. Improve your hair's health & protect strands from damage.  Great for a after bath oil to lock in moisture!

BLACK CASTOR ELIXIR
Jamaican Black Castor Oil is known for its hair growth and thickening properties.  We have blended it with essential oils of sweet orange, rosemary, neem, and ylang ylang for a deep hot oil or daily treatment. This formula is NOT thick it is lighter than traditional black castor making it more suitable for frequent use.

Inside:Jamaican Black Castor Oil, Camellia Seed Oil, Vitamin E, Sweet Orange, Rosemary, Neem, and Ylang Ylang Essential Oils.

GO GREEN LIQUID POMADE
A creamy oil treatment used to maintain moisture, define curls twists and waves and strengthen hair. Use as a daily or as needed. Made with Shea butter, Aloe, Horsetail butter and a minty scent!  A little dab will do, use daily or after wash.

Great for Twist and Braid Styles.

Inside the tube:
Shea Butter,Aloe Juice, Horsetail Butter,  Chlorophyll, rosemary, peppermint oils and LOVE!


BAOBAB OIL
This pure oil is extracted from Baobab fruit seeds absorbes easily and quickly into the skin leaving no oiliness or greasiness.  Highly moisturizing, emollient and soothing, containing vitamins A, D, E and F. 

This versatile all purpose oil, known for it's healing properties Baobab can be used to help heal cuts, burns, eczema, psoriasis,and other skin ailments. Give your hair an intensive repair treatment, add a few drops to your favorite conditioner to help with Winter dryness.  

Oil is pure but can be used neat or blended with other oils such as sunflower, jojoba, or avocado.

Directions: Apply small amounts to skin or hair for added moisture and shine. 

Black Castor, Green Pomade and Avocado Oil are 2oz samples 
Baobab oil comes in a roll on for easy use of this precious oil

name: GO GREEN LIQUID POMADE
description:
A creamy oil treatment used to maintain moisture, define curls twists and waves and strengthen hair. Use as a daily or as needed. Made with Shea butter, Aloe, Horsetail butter and a minty scent!  A little dab will do, use daily or after wash.

Great for Twist and Braid Styles.

Inside the tube:
 Shea Butter,Aloe Juice, Horsetail Butter,  Chlorophyll, rosemary, peppermint oils and LOVE!


"I tried the Green Pomade on a flat twist style, it was so defined and shiny! I couldn't believe how little I used to style my hair, I had to order 2 more to give to my Mom and sister.  They are sold! The smell is so light it doesn't affect any other product you use with it!  Love it Amazing Botanicals! Thank You" Sherise- Las Vegas, NV

My daughters hair is course and hard to style, we have tried everything and nothing has helped.  I purchased the Aloe Mint Spritz and Green Pomade a few weeks ago and used them to twist her hair.  You now have a customer for LIFE! Her hair was soft and the waves from the twists lasted 4 days!  Her hair doesn't last 4 hours, let alone 4 days!  Thank You so Much for making those products my Amanda is so happy and so is Mom." Sharon-Little Rock


I just received the Green Pomade in a subscription box and was skeptical about a "liquid pomade"  It had separated from the heat but, I shook it and it was nice and creamy.  I used your Black Soap Shampoo and Honey Condish and twisted with the pomade.  The pomade was light and I didn't think it would do much in my 4C hair.  I didn't use any heat and when I took the twists out I was convinced!! My hair was soft, defined and the twist out lasted 4 days.  It took a while for the frizz to set in and when it did my hair was still soft!  I Love these Products!  Tamara-Maryland
